name: Farm Kwon Do
description:
Farming using the ancient art of farm kwon do. Till the ground by stomping it, punch seeds into the ground, and kick your fruits into the barrel to earn points!

V -  (Stomp) Till Ground

R - Pick up seeds (must be close to barrel)

R - Punch seeds into ground (need to be by tilled land)

Space - Kick

ESC - Close
